title: How To Wiki
synopsis: Here we describe how to use the web interface to the federated wiki. Read [[About Federated Wiki]] to learn about the project. If you are just starting to write in your first wiki then read the [[Field Guide to the Federation]].

title: Welcome Visitors
synopsis: Welcome to this [[Federated Wiki]] site. From this page you can find [[who we are]] and [[what we do]]. New sites provide this information and then claim the site as their own. You will need your own site to participate.
